ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Surnames
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 20. Just type in /surname  and if it s not taken you ll get it. However I just got my first one and I m discovering that it will
ygData.messageBody:
Level 20. Just type in /surname <and the one you want> and if it's not taken
you'll get it. However I just got my first one and I'm discovering that it
will not accept phrases. For example, I wanted to use "Thehiddenone" for my
main but it would not take it.

I have one picked out for my next one and I hope it will take it.

My mage is ready for his but I'm not sure what to pick. His name is Shizney.
What sounds cool with Shizney? LOL

> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 26 Dec 2003 13:45:10 -0000
> From: "jstrackeicg" <jstrackeicg@...>
> Subject: Happy Holidays All !!
>
> I hope everyone had a good holiday. :)
>
> At what level do you get a second name for your toons?
> (or is there a specific course of action you must take to acheive
> that?)
>
> Plagebearer 20th DE Necro
> Nchanteveryone 10th EU Chanter
> Udyenow 14th TR War
